title: Indonesian Spicy Rice Salad
ingredients: ['250g brown basmati rice, rinsed', '2 tbsp olive oil', '2 tbsp lime or lemon juice', '1 large garlic clove, crushed', '1 large fresh red chilli, seeded and thinly sliced', '2 tbsp soy sauce', '2 tsp clear honey, or to taste', '2 tbsp rice vinegar or white wine vinegar', '4 spring onions, thinly sliced', '2 celery sticks, thinly sliced', '250g sprouted beans or bean sprouts', '100g unsalted cashew nuts or peanuts', 'Chinese leaves and baby spinach, to serve']
